verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's personal attorney [V: has] owed New York more than $ 280,000 in unpaid taxes , an analysis of state records shows
[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's personal attorney] has [V: owed] [ARG2: New York] [ARG1: more than $ 280,000 in unpaid taxes] , an analysis of state records shows
President Donald Trump 's personal attorney has owed New York more than $ 280,000 in unpaid taxes , [ARG0: an analysis] of [ARG0: state records] [V: shows]
